name: Shadow River Lord
resist: cold, fire, necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

trait.name: Amorphous
text: The shadow river lord can move through a space as narrow as one inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The shadow river lord makes two greenfire staff or two shadowfrost bolt attacks. If two attacks hit the same target, the target must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Greenfire Staff
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

action.name: Shadowfrost Bolt
text: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, range 150 ft., one target. 9 (2d8) necrotic damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

action.name: Shadow Geyser (Recharge 6)
text: The shadow river lord expels a geyser of shadowy water from its staff in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) necrotic damage and 21 (6d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
